name: Parallel Dimension
description:
A game made for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam.

In this game, you must guide the other you without any of you dying.

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Restart Level - P
Return to Menu - Escape

HTML version has been tested to be working on the Chromium browser for Linux, and the standalones have been tested to be working on Linux and using Wine.

Game Github: https://github.com/hpnrep6/GMTK2020GameJam-ParallelDimension

Audio credits:
Background music: TheAsianOnes
SFX: freesfx.co.uk
